homeMetaTitle: Forinov, the open innovation social network
homeMetaDescription: Forinov is the open innovation social network that connects startups, companies and partners to facilitate their collaboration. Forinov optimizes monitoring, sourcing, portfolio management of startups and partners ( accelerators, incubators, etc. ).
homeHeaderTitle: Join the largest social network of innovation actors !
homeHeaderParagraph1: Forinov is the platform that connects startups, companies and partners to match the need with the innovation offer.
homeHeaderParagraph2: Discover and contact the best startups on Forinov to turn your good ideas into concrete projects !
homeStartupJoinCardText1: Access to more opportunities (calls for proposals, contests, etc.).
homeStartupJoinCardText2: Increase your visibility and match your solutions with corporates need.
homeStartupJoinCardText3: Get in touch directly with the decision makers and close contracts.
homeCorporateJoinCardText1: Optimise your watch and sourcing of innovation (startups, incubators, etc.).
homeCorporateJoinCardText2: Find concrete solutions by sharing your calls for proposals and your needs in term of innovation.
homeCorporateJoinCardText3: Centralise the follow-up of your collaborators relationships and share it with your startups and partners network.
homePartnerJoinCardText1: Bring visibility and opportunities to your startups and companies network.
homePartnerJoinCardText2: Manage your calls for applications and share your opportunities.
homePartnerJoinCardText3: Simplify your startups wallet (dealflow management, contact follow-up, etc.).
homeCommunitySectionsTitle: More than a community, the most complete solution to get open innovation off the ground.
homeCommunitySectionText1: Gather the key profiles of open innovation players to co-construct the world of tomorrow !
homeCommunitySectionText2: Match in one click the needs of corporates with the solutions of startups and exchange directly with the right persons.
homeCommunitySectionText3: Involve collaborators and enable them to find concrete solutions to their business needs.
homeStartupsCategoriesTitle: Find your gem among {{ startups }} startups sorted into {{ categories }} categories :
homeStructuresSectionTitle: All the actors of innovation are on Forinov what are you waiting for to join them ?
